text:
@realDonaldTrump @HARRISFAULKNER @FoxNews COVID-19 IS NOT MIRACULOUSLY GOING AWAY
TRUMP ABANDONED AMERICANS

TRUMP FAILED TO FEDERALIZE NATIONWIDE TESTING
AND NATIONWIDE PPE

Instead, the states must continue to fend for themselves 
compete against Each other for supplies and testing In the private sector
